author: jim
msg: Allow for the use of IPv6 IPs as APR endpoints. Use of APR_UNSPEC
means that APR can determine to viability of using IPv6; for
example, if APR was built with IPv6 support and/or the platform
kudos to Jean-frederic Clere for 1st spotting the restrictive
